message: Starting investigation of Customer feature completeness. Will examine customer screens, RPC integrations, and booking flows.
Examining cancel_booking_screen.dart - looks complete with RPC integration. No TODO/FIXME found. Missing time restriction validation (should prevent cancellation too close to appointment).
Found payment integration at process_payment_use_case.dart - uses mock gateway simulation. Checking if real payment gateway integration exists.
Scanning all customer screens for TODO/FIXME comments and incomplete implementations
Found complete booking flow with RPC integration (create, cancel, reschedule). Minor TODO: Missing filter implementations in services_by_category_modern.dart. Summarizing all findings now.

Investigation complete. Customer feature is mostly complete with RPC integration. Found 1 CRITICAL issue (mock payment gateway), 3 MEDIUM issues (time restrictions, duplicate screens, RPC not used for reschedule), and 1 LOW issue (incomplete filters). All booking flows functional.
